__e: [Sighs] You see, one thing my daddy taught me is that there is good in the worst of us, but there's also bad in the best of us.
Must be, because if God is good, then why is there evil in the world?
I'm sorry. The problem is not that there is evil in the world, the problem is that there is good.
There's evil in all of us, that's just how it is.
Maybe it makes me a bad person, but I don't have it in me.
Oh, it is Christmastime, and I don't want to be unseasonably mean, so, okay.
And that was out of the evilness of your heart?
And God saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth...
And I'm supposed to just help you out of the evilness of my heart?
Because I realize that killing your closest and oldest friend is beyond evil and yet somehow it's worthy of humor.

He said the world was an inferno full of darkness and evil... and there were only two ways of dealing with it... the first was easy and wrong, to accept it and become part of it... the second way was harder and right, you fight it... and recognize those who aren't evil and help them endure.
But what I saw tonight was just evil.
But wherever there was evil, wherever an innocent would suffer, there would be...
But wherever there was evil, wherever an innocent would suffer, there would be...
But wherever there was evil, wherever an innocent would suffer, there would be...
But wherever there was evil, wherever an innocent would suffer, there would be...
Someone once said there can be no mischief where there's music.
But wherever there was evil, wherever an innocent would suffer, there would be...
